name: Slime Defense
description:
Try to defeat as many Slimes as possible before they overrun you! It gets harder over time. 

This is my submission for Ludum Dare 42's game jam. Most of the time was spent drawing the character and re-learning the basics of Unity. Very exhausting but fun. 

Credits
  • Programming, Art, Design by @dimlyorchid
  • SFX made using BFXR
  • Background Music "Call to Adventure" by Kevin Macleod
